question:
[Ashley] bought her grandfather, [Carlos], a tie for his birthday. [Carlos] rushed to the hospital to find out that his wife and already given birth to a boy and had named him [Gregory]. [Floyd] bought gifts for his lovely sister, [Ashley] [Richard] bought to dress for his father [Daniel] [Gregory] took his sister, [Julie], to a baseball game. [Richard]'s aunt [Mary] took him to the store to do some last minute party shopping. [Ashley] was playing with her brother [Floyd], but her mother [Mary] told her she had to go to bed.
Question: How is [Julie] related to [Daniel]?
